<a id="class_Skeleton2D"></a>

# Skeleton2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](class_node2d.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

The parent of a hierarchy of [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md)\ s, used to create a 2D skeletal animation.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Skeleton2D** parents a hierarchy of [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) nodes. It holds a reference to each [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md)'s rest pose and acts as a single point of access to its bones.

To set up different types of inverse kinematics for the given Skeleton2D, a [SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md) should be created. The inverse kinematics be applied by increasing [SkeletonModificationStack2D.modification_count](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md#class_SkeletonModificationStack2D_property_modification_count) and creating the desired number of modifications.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D skeletons](../tutorials/animation/2d_skeletons.md)

## Signals

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_signal_bone_setup_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**bone_setup_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_signal_bone_setup_changed)

Emitted when the [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) setup attached to this skeletons changes. This is primarily used internally within the skeleton.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_execute_modifications"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **execute_modifications**\ (\ delta\: [float](class_float.md), execution_mode\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_execute_modifications)

Executes all the modifications on the [SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md), if the Skeleton2D has one assigned.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) **get_bone**\ (\ idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone)

Returns a [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) from the node hierarchy parented by Skeleton2D. The object to return is identified by the parameter `idx`. Bones are indexed by descending the node hierarchy from top to bottom, adding the children of each branch before moving to the next sibling.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_bone_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone_count)

Returns the number of [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) nodes in the node hierarchy parented by Skeleton2D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone_local_pose_override"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform2D](class_transform2d.md) **get_bone_local_pose_override**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_get_bone_local_pose_override)

Returns the local pose override transform for `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_get_modification_stack"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md) **get_modification_stack**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_get_modification_stack)

Returns the [SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md) attached to this skeleton, if one exists.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_get_skeleton"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **get_skeleton**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_get_skeleton)

Returns the [RID](class_rid.md) of a Skeleton2D instance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_set_bone_local_pose_override"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_local_pose_override**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](class_int.md), override_pose\: [Transform2D](class_transform2d.md), strength\: [float](class_float.md), persistent\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_set_bone_local_pose_override)

Sets the local pose transform, `override_pose`, for the bone at `bone_idx`.

\ `strength` is the interpolation strength that will be used when applying the pose, and `persistent` determines if the applied pose will remain.

\ **Note:** The pose transform needs to be a local transform relative to the [Bone2D](class_bone2d.md) node at `bone_idx`!

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Skeleton2D_method_set_modification_stack"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_modification_stack**\ (\ modification_stack\: [SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Skeleton2D_method_set_modification_stack)

Sets the [SkeletonModificationStack2D](class_skeletonmodificationstack2d.md) attached to this skeleton.
